root.name: Tales of the Tempest
root.description: OverviewTales of the Tempest was the first Nintendo DS entry in the action RPG series by Namco. The game was developed by Dimps with music by the Tales Studio's sound staff and was published in Japan by Namco on October 26, 2006. Tempest was originally released as a "Mothership Title" in the Tales series but because of the game's poor reception it has since been demoted to a "Escort Title." An unofficial English translation patch for Tales of the Tempest was created by Absolute Zero Translations which was released on April Fools Day in 2013.
